extendedInfo.description: All of your favorite K-POP musicians in one game! Tap your fingers to your favorite music and start SHAKING to the beat! Songs by BIGBANG, 2NE1, Girls' Generation, Super Junior, T-Ara, CNBLUE, 2PM, MBLAQ, IU, After School and more!ï¼Tap & Shake to the music!Musician SHAKE offers traditional "TAPâstyle of gameplay as well as a new âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode, using a seamless-gesture technology developed by dooub. The âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode will make you feel like a DJ scratching the turntable! ï¼Introducing Card Deck System!Musician SHAKE rewards you cards when you complete a game. they can be used in game like an item and receive higher scores! ï¼Contact UsTwitter @MusicianSHAKE Facebook www.facebook.com/MusicianSHAKE

reviews.title: Bought something but hasnt appeared on list
reviews.comment: I bought one of the packages n I still havent recieved it, i tried installing n unistalling n the songs continue to be unplayable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: KEEPS LAGGING!!!
reviews.comment: OMG, i really want to play it because im so into kpop, but it keeps on LAGGING! Ive downloaded other shakes and there isnt the lag. Can you please fix it!
reviews.author: Michelle Vuong

reviews.title: Long Play :(
reviews.comment: It will be better if we can play long play too not only short play... Please enable Long Play.. PLEEEEAAAAASSSSEEE ~~~
reviews.author: Bennilyn Benitez

reviews.title: Eh.. It\'s ok
reviews.comment: It\'s a bit laggy every now and then. Do the songs ever change? Cuz it\'s boring to play the same 4 songs over and over. Also, what happened to Suju shake? I can\'t find it anywhere. :(
reviews.author: Joyce C

reviews.title: FUN !
reviews.comment: Fun and enjoyable if u r into kpop. Long play has been removed but 4 songs are currently made available . The cards aren\'t really worth earning as they aren\'t pictures of the artists themselves.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: This is better than tap tap revenge! I love it! But sometimes it keep force closing;( other than that ,this is awesome!
reviews.author: Jun An

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Great game. I love playing it i bought all of the packages. I stopped playing for a while and now it says all of my songs need to be bought again. But when i try rebuying the packs it says i already own this item. Kind of disappointed because i wanted to play again
reviews.author: Brittany Fraley

reviews.title: Poor!!!
reviews.comment: Good game but bad n poor usage!! Cant really play it! Keeps on crash!!
reviews.author: Ronald Tan

reviews.comment: Omg...this lagged so much...I play the game when I feel like it, not the app let me play the game when it feel like it.     I want my money  back
reviews.author: Faye Vuong

reviews.title: Awesome app!!
reviews.comment: Finally a portrait music tapping app!! Love the current lists of songs although they should have more of the older ones like Sorry Sorry or Abracadabra. (Shall wait and see :)). A bit buggy and always force closes but should be fixed soon. Overall, awesome app!! A must have for all KPOP fanatics ^^.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: When I downloaded this app some of the songs were available in long play so I enjoyed it but then the next day the songs that had long play now only have short play :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keep crashing
reviews.comment: The app keeps crashing during playing (long play mode)...The screen freezes but the song keeps playing...please fix!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful  !
reviews.comment: 1 star is withheld as it is not for free  XD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It lags so much and I cant play even though everything loads already.. Bad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: I like musician shake but I really want girls generation and super junior shake!! I found them in the apple app store why don\'t you have it for Google play. Please bring it here!!!
reviews.author: Mandarin Vancouver

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This is just no. It never loads and when it does it gives me a F when i havent played anything yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Laggy
reviews.comment: This game good but, its get laggy when playing at extreme level, please fix..
reviews.author: Adrian Latief

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Luv Kpop
reviews.author: Stella Seo

reviews.title: Lag !!!
reviews.comment: I have download big bang, t-ara, cnblue and other shake, it also lag !!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: This app is nice and cool. But one thing bad is loading very slow. And Why I can\'t play IU Shake? Pls fix it. Tq.
reviews.author: Colette Lim
